Title: Requires school districts to complete an analysis to determine learning loss and delayed educational progress for students in an individualized learning plan and didn't get in-person learning due to the COVID-19
Summary: Requires school districts in the state to complete an analysis to determine learning loss and delayed educational progress for students who participated in an individualized learning plan and did not receive in-person learning due to the COVID-19 state disaster emergency; requires such analysis to be submitted to the commissioner.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring school districts in the state to complete an analysis to determine learning loss and delayed educational progress for students who participated in an individualized learning plan and did not receive in-person learning due to the COVID-19 state disaster emergency
